alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Rockdale, southern DeKalb, northwestern Henry, south central Fulton and northern Clayton Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lakewood Park, or near Atlanta, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, East Point, Stockbridge, Forest Park, College Park, Morrow, Hapeville, Avondale Estates, Lake City, Lithonia, Belvedere Park, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Decatur, North Druid Hills and Rex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; DeKalb; Henry; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton
